item.description:
Happy Spring (finally)! Let's congregate in my big backyard with a bonfire.

7:30 â€“ 11:30

Bring your own
- Beverage (will have a small cooler and some room in the fridge)
- Blanket and Chair

Optional
- Snacks
- Ipod to DJ (we won't be blasting to be nice to the neighbors)


Rain date: May 9
This is an outside party. House will be accessible for bathroom. Pets will be locked away from human contact but fyi if you are severely allergic.

I will email everyone who rsvps the specific directions the day before and the morning of the party. I'm in the Providence College area.
item.how_to_find_us: Will email specific directions to those who rsvp day before.
item.name: Bonfire Party
